img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Teacher of the Year

span.p: Nixa Public Schools would like to congratulate Pedro Benitez on being named the Nixa Teacher of the Year. We would also like to recognize the finalists: Susan Coffman, David Mitchell, and Kristy Richart. Thank you toCentral Gas Propanefor sponsoring our Teacher of the Year program.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020 Teacher of the Year

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: march 30

span.p: Click here for information about COVID-19, messages to parents, family assistance resources, and more.

div.span: Download the FreeNixa Schools' District App

a.title: Go to comments for Download Nixa App

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Tumbler

span.div: Get your Nixa Eagles 16 oz stainless steel tumbler. All purchases will directly benefit the Back to School Bash.These may be picked up at Faught Administration Center on the second floor after purchase orstaffmembers can have them sent to their school. Limited quantity is available.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: QuickNews enewsletter

span.p: QuickNews is a bi-weekly email from the district covering events, updates, accomplishments, and other happenings in Nixa.

a.style: background-color: #bc2919; border: 1px solid #5b5b5b; color: #ffffff; display: inline-block; padding: 8px 15px; text-shadow: none; border-radius: 0px;

a.title: Go to comments for Sign-Up for QuickNews

p.span: Nixa Public Schools is now hiring for several positions, apply here!

a.title: Go to comments for Now Hiring

span.strong: How the District Communicates with You

span.p: We want to make sure that you are getting the communication you want and need!

span.strong: Here's how we are going to communicate with you.

a.title: Go to comments for How the District Communicates with You

div.p: Nixa Public Schools 301 South Main Street Nixa, MO 65714 Site Map
Nixa Public Schools 301 South Main Street Nixa, MO 65714 Site Map
Nixa Public Schools 301 South Main Street Nixa, MO 65714

div.div: All notices and open bids at www.nixacommunication.net. Also, interested persons, including persons with impaired vision or hearing, can obtain information as to the existence and location of services, activities, and facilities that are accessible to and usable by persons with disabilities by contacting Karen McKnight, executive director of special services, at 4174493270 or by email, and Robert Klug, facilities director, at 4174493298 or by email. You can also contact them through mail at 301 S. Main St., Nixa, MO 65714.
